function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare infrastructure to cope with health emergencies","Impact":"Increased health risks for the population, overwhelmed healthcare facilities, and heightened mortality rates","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, disaster preparedness, and emergency response systems","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote healthcare monitoring, and disaster management systems","People":"Population of Nigeria, especially those in vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and international aid agencies"},{"Description":"Societal and socio-economic gaps exacerbating the impact of health emergencies","Impact":"Worsening of economic disparities, educational inequality, and social mobility restrictions","Mitigation":"Social support systems, investment in education, and income security measures","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, social support apps, and financial assistance programs","People":"Low-income families, children, students, and unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, and non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of climate change and global warming on inducing disasters","Impact":"Increased frequency of disasters, environmental degradation, and displacement of communities","Mitigation":"Climate change adaptation strategies, disaster preparedness, and sustainable environmental practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, early warning systems, and climate modeling tools","People":"Communities vulnerable to climate change and natural disasters","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government, and international conservation organizations"}]}
